name: Adventures Of Ron
description:
= Adventures Of Ron =

This game was made in Unity for a College project on "Atari Smash-Ups" where we had to combine 2 Atari games and create a game from them. The two Atari games I have chosen for this project was Centipede & DragonFire.

Adventures of Ron has been under the working title of "Centifire" for a month and is now finally ready to be graded and released.

Adventures of Ron was the first game I have created from start to finish, all with my own Assets. Only assets that don't belong to me are....

Music - https://www.bensound.com/

Font = https://www.dafont.com/frost-giant.font
